item.title: About This Site
item.description: This is a test site for my new blog (probably). Nothing to see here yet!

item.title: Test Blog Post
item.description: Hello there! Here’s some inline math: \( \int x^3 dx \) And here’s some centered math: $$\int_{a}^{b} x^2 dx$$ And now for some code! void DoSomething() { Whatever(); for(int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) { auto x = i * 2; printf("i", x); } } How about a cool image? Conclusion This has been a great test.
